modName: Alternative Start by NsisHD - Narkhir the Void Courier
summary: A early game save file that gives the player the chance to start with an awesome Dark Elf in the very beggining of the Dark Brotherhood Quest Line.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][center]Are you tired of Nords and Dragons? 
Do you want to start a new game with a character that you never thought that was so awesome? 
A Dark Elf assassin perhaps?[/center][/b][/size]

[color=crimson][center][i]If so, this is the « mod » for you.[/i][/center][/color]

[i]It is a basic save file based on the mod \"Alternative Life Start\".[/i]

[color=crimson][b]REQUIRES THE FOLLOWING MODS:[/b][/color][list]
[*]Apachii Hair
[*]Ethereal Elven Overhaul Lite [i](Optional but recommended, so it is the same as the screenshots)[/i][/list]

[size=3][color=crimson]Role-Playing Story:[/color][/size]

[i]Nar\'Khir never liked Morrowind. He was part of a rich and powerful family in there. But life was borring and meaningless.
One day, Nar\'Khir had a dream. A dream of a cadaverous mother, something behond the physic world, something to fight for. He woke up and saw two daggers in his end table. Two hollowed crafted Daedric Daggers that he never saw on his life.[/i][b] \"Such a beauty...\"[/b][i]
Nar\'khir started to kill his enemies without remorse and was further exiled.
He enjoyed it.
This Void Courier was sent to many places around the world completing contracts that were given to him on his dreams.
He end up in Skyrim and Astrid knew about his deeds.[/i][b] \"A perfect acquisition to the Brotherhood\" [/b][i]she said to Arnbjorn.[/i]
[b]\"Your days in the Dark Brotherhood are about to start. You are not alone anymore!\"[/b] -[i] Night Mother[/i]

[size=3][color=crimson]Hope you enjoy the save file! I\'m going to complete the Dark Brotherhood once more too ;) [/color][/size]
author: NsisHD aka Sazyo
